Plot: Lost Boys of Sudan is a feature-length documentary that follows two Sudanese refugees on an extraordinary journey from Africa to America. Orphaned as young boys in one of Africa's cruelest ...
Title: Lost Boys of Sudan
Actors: Santino Majok Chuor, Jarrid Geduld, Peter Kon Dut
tomatoConsensus: The Lost boys of Sudan works as both a riveting documentary and scathing indictment of colonialism.
